participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Playful and energetic, enjoys strategic challenges.
participant_1.background: i like to play chess. i do not drink alcohol. i'm in my thirties. i'm single and with two dogs.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Creative and nostalgic, has a passion for music and dance.
participant_2.background: my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite. i love new kids on the block. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80 s.

content.text: Let`s have a dance! I have known one more move!
